### Government Tender Announcement
#### W0142-24X004 Electronic Portable Axle Pad Scale System

**Tender Announcement Details**

* Reference Number: WS4220348025-Doc4220375718
* Solicitation Number: WS4220348025
* Amended on: 2023-10-04
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-17 14:00 EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-10-30
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-10-30
* Tender Status: Expired

#### Notice Details
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Variations or combinations of the above methods
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contract Details
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address:
  * Address Line: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
  * City: Gatineau
  * Province: Quebec
  * Postal Code: K1A 0S5
  * Country: Canada
* End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* End User Entity Address:
  * Address Line: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario
  * City: Ottawa
  * Province: Ontario
  * Postal Code: K1A 0K2
  * Country: Canada

#### Documentation
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17492928?extsite=MTc0OTI5MjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Tender Description: Please note that the tender closing time has been amended to 2023-10-17 14:00 EDT. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the revised closing time. Bids received after the closing time will be considered non-responsive. 
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a portable electronic axle pad scale system to support their maintenance, transport, and lodging units. The system must meet the specifications outlined in the annex basis of payment and mandatory technical evaluation criteria. The contractor must deliver the system as per the requirements and specifications detailed in the tender notice. 

**Contact Information**
